summary: MY VEHICLE HAS LESS THAN 59K MILES AND THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT IS ON.  I WAS TOLD THE CAR IS RUNNING TOO COOL.  THERE IS AN ISSUE WITH THE COOLANT SYSTEM, FUEL SYSTEM ETC.  THE CAR DRIVES FINE HOWEVER, THE DEALERSHIP NEEDS TO REPLACE HOSES, HOUSINGS, ETC.  TO THE TUNE OF $1382  I HAVE NEVER HEARD OF A CAR RUNNING TOO COOL..  THIS IS A MANUFACTURING ISSUE.  ALSO, THE HEADLINER ATTACHED TO THE SUNROOF HAS FALLED DUE TO HEAT AND I UNDERSTAND THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM WITH THESE JAGUARS.
